page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF OUR VICAR.} OUR VICAR,REV. PETER COX,STARTS HIS DAY BY SAYING MATINS WHICH INCLUDES READING PASSAGES AND PSALMS FROM THE BIBLE.HE LEADS A VERY BUSY LIFE.PART OF THE MORNINGS ARE TAKEN UP WITH READING THE BIBLE AND OTHER THEOLOGICAL BOOKS. HE PREPARES HIS SUNDAY SERMON AND THERE IS ADMINISTRATIVE WORK TO DO.THERE ARE THREE PARISH REGISTERS IN WHICH HE HAS TO ENTER THE NAMES OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN CHRISTENED,MARRIED OR BURIED. {THERE ARE LETTERS TO ANSWER AND CHURCH {COUNCIL MEETINGS TO ARRANGE. SOME {MORNINGS HE GIVES HOLY COMMUNION TO {PEOPLE WHO ARE HOUSEBOUND AND CANNOT {ATTEND CHURCH.OFTEN HE GOES TO CLUN Y {BONT, THE OLD PEOPLE'S HOMES.IN THE {AFTERNOONS HE VISITS THE SICK PEOPLE {IN HOSPITAL OR NEW FAMILIES WHO HAVE {MOVED INTO THE AREA.}
